text: The 1992 Arab Cup (Arabic: ) was the 6th Arab Cup tournament. Egypt won the tournament after defeating Saudi Arabia in the final. The tournament was part of the 1992 Pan Arab Games, but also counted for the Arab Cup. Iraq was banned from the tournament because of the Gulf War. == Group stage == === Group A === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 2 1 1 0 2 1 +1 3 2 2 1 0 1 4 2 +2 2 3 2 0 1 1 2 5 –3 1 8 September 1992 align=right 10 September 1992 align=right 12 September 1992 align=right === Group B === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 2 1 1 0 3 2 +1 3 2 2 0 2 0 1 1 0 2 3 Palestine 2 0 1 1 1 2 –1 1 9 September 1992 align=right 11 September 1992 align=right 13 September 1992 align=right == Knockout stage == === Bracket === {{Round4-with third |15 September — Aleppo| (pen)|0 (4)||0 (3) |15 September — Aleppo||2||0 |17 September — Aleppo||3||2 |17 September — Aleppo||2||1 }} == Statistics == === Tournament rankings === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 4 2 2 0 5 3 +2 6 2 4 2 1 1 7 5 +2 5 3 4 2 0 2 6 5 +1 4 4 4 0 3 1 2 3 –1 3 Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage Eliminated in the Group stage 5 Palestine 2 0 1 1 1 2 –1 1 6 2 0 1 1 2 5 –3 1 * Rankings are based on performance, not team skill.
